name: VIDdEO
description: You are combing through security footage to find out what has taken place in a hotel. However, the result is not clear. The perceived reality of the footage is blending into your own reality. You find yourself inside and outside the media discovering the tapes in the very place you are watching. Identities are disapearing, context is no longer existing. Nothing is sacred anymore, and you are constantly feeling dread and unawareness.
